; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains the surface area of the working electrode in a cyclic voltammetry experiment.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Quantity]].

; Values
* Input fields should be restricted to positive numbers (<nowiki>regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/</nowiki>).

; Corresponds
* [[Corresponds to::1 mm²]]

; Unit
* [[Display units::mm²]]
